PARAMETER.NAME: targetedAnnotation
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The name of the targeted annotation

PARAMETER.NAME: mappedFeature
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The name of the mapped feature

PARAMETER.NAME: createdFeature
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The name of the feature that will be created by this component

PARAMETER.NAME: mappingFile
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The file containing a string to string mapping (format = mappedFeature value \t createdFeature value \n)
